subject: Golf
Texas Open (Golf)
lead_paragraph: Walker took advantage of greatly improved weather conditions at his home tournament to seize a one-shot lead over Aaron Baddeley and Charley Hoffman in the second round of the Texas Open.
snippet: Walker took advantage of greatly improved weather conditions at his home tournament to seize a one-shot lead over Aaron Baddeley and Charley Hoffman in the second round of the Texas Open.
